aura: (Su) Creatures within 300 feet of a zygomind must succeed at a DC 36 Will save each round or become fascinated by the plant's soothing mental commands. Since in most cases a known zygomind is an obvious threat (thus breaking the fascinated effect)
this ability mainly assists an undetected zygomind
though even creatures who know of the zygomind's threat are still exposed to the zygomind's seamless reality ability if they fail the saving throw. The save DC is Charisma-based.
name: Zygomind
